com.emc.vipr.client.core

Class ObjectVirtualPools

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.vipr.client.core.AbstractResources<T>
      • com.emc.vipr.client.core.AbstractBulkResources<T>
        • com.emc.vipr.client.core.AbstractCoreBulkResources<ObjectVirtualPoolRestRep>
          • com.emc.vipr.client.core.ObjectVirtualPools
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ACLResources, BulkResources<ObjectVirtualPoolRestRep>, QuotaResources, Resources<ObjectVirtualPoolRestRep>, TopLevelResources<ObjectVirtualPoolRestRep>

    public class ObjectVirtualPools
extends AbstractCoreBulkResources<ObjectVirtualPoolRestRep>
implements TopLevelResources<ObjectVirtualPoolRestRep>, ACLResources, QuotaResources
    Object Virtual Pools resources.

    Base URL: /object/vpools
